TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConnectionStringsExpressionBuilder extends System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder

summary.span: 擷取 (或產生程式碼以擷取) Web.config 檔案之 <> 區段的值。

span.span: Retrieves, or generates code to retrieve, values from the <> section of the Web.config file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供存取中的值 <`connectionStrings`> Web.config 檔案區段。The class provides access to values in the <`connectionStrings`> section of the Web.config file. <`connectionStrings`> Web.config 檔案區段包含在名稱/值組的連接字串值。The <`connectionStrings`> section of the Web.config file contains connection string values in name/value pairs. 擷取連接字串值是將表單的運算式A connection string value is retrieved by assigning an expression of the form `<%$ ConnectionStrings: secureConnectionString %>` 給控制項屬性。to a control property. 之後的冒號表示的連接字串名稱的一部分的冒號 （:） 前後的運算式會指定運算式來擷取，並將部分的類型。The part of the expression before the colon (:) designates the type of expression to be retrieved, and the part after the colon signifies the name of the connection string. 上述運算式會從 Web.config 檔案擷取下列的值。The preceding expression would retrieve the following value from the Web.config file. `` `` `` 當頁面剖析器遇到具有前置詞的運算式`ConnectionStrings`，它會建立的執行個體類別來處理的運算式。When the page parser encounters an expression with the prefix `ConnectionStrings`, it creates an instance of the class to handle the expression. 如果運算式中的頁面，將會編譯發生物件產生的 Web.config 檔案中擷取指定的連接字串的程式碼。If the expression is encountered in a page that will be compiled, the object generates code that retrieves the specified connection string from the Web.config file. 如果運算式中的頁面，不會被轉譯時，發生物件會傳回 Web.config 檔案中的值剖析頁面時。If the expression is encountered in a page that will not be compiled, the object returns the value from the Web.config file when the page is parsed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式使用要從執行 Microsoft SQL Server 的電腦中擷取資料，並顯示在控制項控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively use a control to retrieve data from a computer running Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql/CS/sql3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql/VB/sql3vb.aspx#1)] 程式碼會擷取下列連接字串的 Web.config 檔案中。The code retrieves the following connection string from the Web.config file. `` `` `` `` ``

summary.span: 傳回 Web.config 檔案之 <> 區段的值。

span.span: Returns a value from the <> section of the Web.config file.

returns.span: 與 Web.config 檔案中 <> 區段內之索引鍵相關聯的 。

span.span: The associated with a key in the <> section of the Web.config file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式的運算式時，會呼叫這個方法`<%$ ConnectionStrings: secureConnectionString %>`遇到未編譯的頁面中。This method is called when an expression of the form `<%$ ConnectionStrings: secureConnectionString %>` is encountered in a page that is not compiled. 它會擷取適當的值從 <`connectionStrings`> Web.config 檔案區段。It retrieves the appropriate value from the <`connectionStrings`> section of the Web.config file. 這個方法會覆寫方法，藉由呼叫方法，如果連接字串中包含`parsedData`參數，或藉由呼叫方法，如果連接字串未包含在`parsedData`參數。This method overrides the method by calling the method if a connection string is included in the `parsedData` parameter, or by calling the method if a connection string is not included in the `parsedData` parameter.

exception.span: 在 Web.config 檔案中找不到連接字串名稱。

span.span: The connection string name could not be found in the Web.config file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks CodeDOM 建立期間呼叫這個方法的頁面或控制項。This method is called during the CodeDOM creation for a page or control. 傳回的物件屬於下列類型和表示要擷取連接字串值時呼叫的方法。The object returned is of the type and represents the method to call when retrieving a connection string value.

summary.span: 傳回值，指出是否可在未編譯的頁面中評估運算式。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression can be evaluated in a page that is not compiled.
in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出是否方法已經在類別中實作。The property indicates whether the method has been implemented in the class. 必須實作內的運算式未編譯的頁面中評估運算式產生器。 must be implemented within an expression builder for an expression to be evaluated in a page that is not compiled. 支援無編譯評估的連接字串，因此`true`一律會傳回。 supports no-compile evaluation of connection strings, so `true` is always returned.
